articles.title: Threads Hashtags How To Add X-Like Blue Tags With Special Character, Space In Posts; Tech Guide - Jagran English
articles.description: Hashtags On Threads: Meta is now rolling out tags similar to Xs hashtags on Threads. Users can only tag one topic in a post to limit spamming. A Threads user can tapclick on a tag to open the associated posts within the search view.
articles.content: Meta Threads Update: Elon Musk's X (formerly Twitter) competitor Threads has introduced yet another feature to catch up with the microblogging platform. The social media mogul is now rolling out tags… [+1983 chars]
